subject: Baseball
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: When Al Leiter saw a pitching rubber that contained 56 signatures from players who had thrown a perfect game or a no-hitter at a card show last month, he wanted it.
snippet: When Al Leiter saw a pitching rubber that contained 56 signatures from players who had thrown a perfect game or a no-hitter at a card show last month, he wanted it.
